name: test_account_negative_scenarios[David Brown]
description:
Test negative scenarios like Missing Fields.
    Uses 'accounts_api_manager' to authenticate, proving that even valid users
    cannot send invalid data (422 Unprocessable Entity).

parameters.name: row
parameters.value: {'tags': 'regression', 'scenario': 'missing fields', 'account_holder_name': 'David Brown', 'dob': '1979-12-05', 'gender': 'Male', 'email': 'david.brown@example.com', 'phone': '', 'address': '500 Elm St, Dallas, TX', 'zip_code': '75201', 'account_type': 'Current', 'balance': '120000.00', 'status': 'Active', 'services': 'Internet Banking,SMS Alerts', 'marketing_opt_in': 'true', 'updated_account_holder_name': 'David Brown Jr', 'updated_dob': '1979-12-05', 'updated_gender': 'Male', 'updated_email': 'david.brownjr@example.com', 'updated_phone': '+1-555-0303', 'updated_address': '700 Oak St, Dallas, TX', 'updated_zip_code': '75202', 'updated_account_type': 'Current', 'updated_balance': '118000.00', 'updated_status': 'Active', 'updated_services': 'Internet Banking,Cheque Book', 'updated_marketing_opt_in': 'false'}
